column1: Masters in Data Analytics for Business
column3: ISEG - Lisbon School of Economics and Management
column5: ObjectivesThe Masters in Data Analytics for Business aims to: develop professional skills to use advanced quantitative decision-making methods;develop research skills in the field of data analysis;prepare students for a cross-national cultural environment, with colleagues from several nationalities.Designed ForGraduates with a solid background in quantitative methods. Candidates must hold a first degree or equivalent in the areas of mathematics, statistics, information systems, management, economics, finance, mathematics applied to economics and management, or engineering. Applicants holding other degrees can also be accepted.
